AltName.entry: BLACK WOMENS RESOURCE CENTRE - WATOTO PRE-SCHOOL

Desc.entry: Not-for-profit organisation providing full day care that is registered by OFSTED, delivering integrated nursery education and childcare places and enabling parent/carers to take up education, training and employment opportunities. Aims to ensure children have a 'Sure Start' in readiness for school and have access to a stimulating, safe and fun environment. Targets children primarily but not exclusively from the Black community. Provides a service that acts as a springboard for parents and children raising the level of educational attainment and creating employment primarily for local people that reflects the cultural diversity of the community.

Langs.entry: Arabic, Chinese, Punjabi, Somali, Swahili, Urdu

ContactName.entry: Miss S Brown, Childcare Manager/ Miss L Linton

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
